duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide personalized in-store experience for customers through make-up artistry and education.
Work within a high-performing team to create impactful in-store events and ensure high standards of visual merchandising.
Demonstrate ability to provide inspirational, authentic, and personalized customer service.
Work retail hours including days, nights, weekends, and special events in a fast-paced work environment.
Utilize retail point-of-sale software and contribute to achieving high standards of visual merchandising.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Make-up Artistry (retail experience preferred)
